sections.text: Who were committed to the Department of Youth Rehabilitation Services ("DYRS") during the previous calendar year;
Who received the required behavioral health screening;
Whose behavioral health screening indentified a need for further behavioral health assessment;
Who received a behavioral health assessment; and
Who were referred to appropriate services;
The reasons why a committed youth in DYRS did not receive the required behavioral health screening or behavioral health assessment, if any; and

If necessary, recommendations on how DYRS can ensure that all of its committed youth are receiving the required behavioral health screenings and behavioral health assessments along with an estimate of the time it will take to meet that requirement.
